column3: Started from completed Project 08 with engagement features working. PostLike, PostFavorite, and Comment models have helper methods. Controllers use model methods (no raw SQL in PostEngagementController, ProfileController, PostsController, Admin\CommentsController).
Dashboard is routed through public/index.php via Router to Admin\DashboardController. Controller extends base Controller class. Uses proper MVC structure with no standalone PHP files.
Dashboard requires authentication AND admin role. Non-admin users are properly redirected with appropriate flash messages. Admin users redirect to dashboard after login (not profile page).

Post model includes dashboard analytics helpers: count(), countByStatus(status), countFeatured(), averageLikes(), averageFavs(), averageComments() (averages scoped to published posts). Methods use prepared statements where parameters exist and return correct types.

User model includes countByRole(role). BaseModel (and other models) expose a generic count() helper for totals. Prepared statements/parameter binding used where appropriate. Returns correct integer counts.

DashboardController uses ONLY model methods for standard queries (no raw SQL for counts, averages, role counting). Complex dashboard-specific analytics (totalInteractions, mostActiveUser) may use raw SQL.

Dashboard displays KPIs: total/draft/published/featured posts, user counts by role, contact message count, engagement averages, total interactions, most active user. Uses view templating with layout and partials.

Dashboard shows recent contact messages and/or recent posts/users. Clean, professional UI using Bulma CSS. Navigation includes admin dashboard link (admins only). Footer includes site info and contact link.
All dashboard forms include CSRF tokens. All dynamic output uses $this->e() for XSS protection. Prepared statements used throughout. Continues security practices from Project 08.
Follows MVC patterns consistently. Dashboard integrates seamlessly with existing Project 08 features. Professional-quality code suitable for production delivery.
